forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
